Verses: 1 isravelar Ellaarum Epronilirukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Koodivandhu: Idho, Naangal Ummudaiya Elumbum Ummudaiya Maamsamumaanavargal.

2 savul Innum Raajaavaayirukkumpodhe, Neer Isravelai Nadaththikkondupoi Nadaththikkonduvaruveer; En Janamaagiya Isravelai Neer Meyththu, En Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Thalaivanaayiruppeer Endru Ummudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Umakku Solliyum Irukkiraar Endraargal.

3 appadiye Isravelin Moopparellaarum Epronile Raajaavinidaththil Vandhaargal; Dhaaveedhu Epronile Karththarukku Munbaaga Avargalodu Udanpadikkai Pannikkondapinbu, Karththar Saamuvelaikkondu Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye Avargal Dhaaveedhai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal.
4 pinbu Dhaaveedhu Isravel Anaiththodunkooda Epoosaagiya Erusalemukkup Ponaan; Epoosiyar Aththesaththin Kudigalaayirundhaargal.
5 appozhudhu Epoosin Kudigal Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Nee Idharkul Pravesippadhillai Endraargal; Aanaalum Dhaaveedhu Seeyon Kottaiyaip Pidiththaan; Adhu Dhaaveedhin Nagaramaayitru.

6 epoosiyarai Muriya Adikkiradhil Evan Mundhinavanaayirukkiraano, Avan Thalaivanum Senaapadhiyumaayiruppaanendru Dhaaveedhu Solliyirundhaan; Seruyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaab Mundhi Erith Thalaivanaanaan.
7 dhaaveedhu Andhak Kottaiyil Vaasampanninapadiyinaal, Adhu Dhaaveedhin Nagaram Ennappattadhu.
8 pirpaadu Avan Nagaraththai Millo Thodangi Sutrilum Kattinaan; Yovaab Nagaraththin Matra Idangalaip Pazhudhupaarththaan.
9 dhaaveedhu Naalukkunaal Viruththiyadaindhaan; Senaigaludaiya Karththar Avanodekooda Irundhaar.

10 karththar Isravelukkaaga Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Dhaaveedhai Raajaavaakkumpadi Avan Vasamaayirundhu Raajyabaarampannugira Avanidaththilum, Sagala Isravelaridaththilum, Veerathaththuvaththaip Paaraattina Pradhaana Paraakkiramasaaligalum,

11 dhaaveedhukku Irundha Andhap Paraakkiramasaaligalin Lakkamumaavadhu: Akmoniyin Kumaaranaagiya Yaashobiyaam Ennum Servaikkaararin Thalaivan; Ivan Munnoorupergalinmel Than Eettiyai Ongi Avargalai Orumikkakkondrupottaan.
12 ivanukku Irandaavadhu Akoyin Kumaaranaagiya Thodhovin Magan Eleyaasaar; Ivan Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalil Oruvan.
13 pelisthar Paasthammeemilirukkira Vaarkodhumai Niraindha Vayalnilaththil Yuththaththirkuk Koodivandhapodhum, Janam Pelistharaik Kandu Odinapodhum Ivan Dhaaveedhode Ange Irundhaan.
14 appozhudhu Avargal Andha Nilaththin Naduvile Nindru Adhaik Kaappaatrip Pelistharai Madangadiththaargal; Adhinaale Karththar Periya Ratchippai Nadappiththaar.
15 muppadhu Thalaivaril Moondruper Adhullaam Ennum Kanmalaik Kebiyilirukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Poyirundhaargal; Pelistharin Paalayam Reppaayeem Pallaththaakkil Irangugirapodhu,
16 dhaaveedhu Aranaana Oru Idaththilirundhaan; Appozhudhu Pelistharin Thaanaiyam Bethlagemil Irundhadhu.
17 dhaaveedhu Bethlagemin Olimugavaasalilirukkira Kinatrin Thanneermel Aavalkondu, En Thaagaththirkuk Konjam Thanneer Konduvarugiravan Yaar Endraan.

18 appozhudhu Andha Moondruper Pelistharin Paalayaththirkul Thunindhu Pugundhupoi, Bethlagemin Olimugavaasalilirukkira Kinatrile Thanneer Mondu Dhaaveedhinidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Aanaalum Avan Adhaik Kudikka Manadhillaamal Adhaik Karththarukkendru Ootrippottu:

19 naan Idhai Seyyaadhapadikku, En Dhevan Ennaik Kaaththukkollakkadavar; Thangal Praananai Ennaamal Poi Adhaik Konduvandha Indha Manusharin Raththaththaik Kudippeno Endru Solli Adhaik Kudikkamaatten Endraan. Ippadi Indha Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalum Seydhaargal.
20 yovaabin Sagodharanaagiya Abisaai Andha Moondruperil Pradhaanamaanavan; Avan Than Eettiyai Ongi, Munnooruperai Madangadiththadhinaal Indha Moondruperil Perpetravanaanaan.
21 indha Moondruperil Avan Matra Iranduperilum Menmaiyullavanaanadhinaal, Avargalil Thalaivanaanaan; Aanaalum Andha Mundhina Moondruperukku Avan Samaanamaanavanalla.

22 paraakkiramasaaliyaagiya Yoidhaavin Kumaaranum, Kapseyel Ooraanumaagiya Penaayaavum Seygaigalil Vallavanaayirundhaan; Avan Movaab Dhesaththin Irandu Valumaiyaana Singangalaik Kondradhumallaamal, Uraindha Mazhaipeydha Naalil Avan Oru Kebikkulle Irangippoi, Oru Singaththaik Kondraan.

23 aindhumuzha Uyaramaana Oru Egipthiyanaiyum Avan Kondrupottaan; Andha Egipthiyan Kaiyil Neygiravargalin Padaimarak Kanadhiyaana Oru Eetti, Irukkaiyil, Ivan Oru Thadiyaip Pidiththu, Avanidaththil Poi, Andha Egipthiyan Kaiyilirundha Eettiyaip Pariththu, Avan Eettiyinaale Avanaik Kondrupottaan.
24 ivaigalai Yoidhaavin Kumaaranaana Penaayaa Seydhapadiyinaal, Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalukkulle Perpetravanaai Irundhaan.
25 muppadhuperilum Ivan Menmaiyullavan; Aanaalum Andha Mundhina Moondruperukkum Ivan Samaanamaanavanalla; Avanai Dhaaveedhu Than Meykkaavalarukkuth Thalaivanaaga Vaiththaan.
26 iraanuvaththilirundha Matrap Paraakkiramasaaligal: Yovaabin Thambi Aasagel, Bethlagem Ooraanaagiya Thodhovin Kumaaran Elkkaanaan,
27 aarodhiyanaagiya Sammodh, Peloniyanaagiya Eles,
28 thekkoviyanaagiya Ikkesin Kumaaran Eeraa, Aanadhoththiyanaagiya Abiyesar,
29 oosaaththiyanaagiya Sipekkaai, Akogiyanaagiya Eelaai,
30 neththobaaththiyanaagiya Magaraayi, Neththobaaththiyanaagiya Paanaavin Kumaaran Eledh,
31 benyameen Puththirarin Kibeyaa Ooraanaagiya Ribaayin Kumaaran Iththaayi, Praththoniyanaagiya Penaayaa,
32 kaagaas Neerodai Dhesaththaanaagiya Ooraayi, Arpaaththiyanaagiya Abiyel,
33 pagaroomiyanaagiya Asmaavedh, Saalponiyanaagiya Eliyaabaa,
34 keesoniyanaagiya Aasemin Kumaarar, Aaraariyanaagiya Saagiyin Kumaaran Yonaththaan.
35 aaraariyanaagiya Saakkaarin Kumaaran Agiyaam, Oorin Kumaaran Elibaal,
36 megaraaththiyanaagiya Epper, Peloniyanaagiya Agiyaa,
37 karmeliyanaagiya Esro, Espaayin Kumaaran Naaraayi,
38 naaththaanin Sagodharan Yovel, Agariyin Kumaaran Mipkaar,
39 ammoniyanaagiya Selek, Seruyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaabin Aayudhadhaariyaana Peroththiyanaagiya Naaraayi,
40 iththariyanaagiya Eeraa, Iththariyanaagiya Kaarep,
41 eththiyanaagiya Uriyaa, Aklaayin Kumaaran Saabaadh,
42 roobaniyarin Thalaivanaagiya Seesaavin Kumaaran Adhinaa Ennum Roobaniyan; Avanode Muppadhuper Irundhaargal.
43 maagaavin Kumaaran Aanaan, Midhiniyanaagiya Yosabaadh,
44 asthareththiyanaagiya Usiyaa, Aaroveriyanaagiya Oththaamin Kumaarar Samaavum, Yegiyelum,
45 simriyin Kumaaran Edhiyaayel, Thidhsiyanaagiya Avan Sagodharan Yogaa,
46 maagaaviyarin Puththiran Eliyel, Elnaamin Kumaarar Eribaayum, Yosaviyaavum, Movaabiyanaana Idhmaavum,
47 mesobaayaa Ooraaraagiya Eliyelum, Obedhum, Yaasiyelume.
